text: Jihare loka tuhade nala bai'ata (pratigi'a) karade hana uha asala vica alaha nala pratigi'a karade hana. Alaha da hatha unham de hatham tom upara hai. Phira jihara bada isa (va'ade) nu taurega tam va'ada torana da nukasana use nu hai ate jihara bada usa va'ade nu pura karega jihara usa ne alaha nala kita hai tam alaha isa nu vada fala bakhasega
